addNewBid(mapping(bytes32 => mapping(add.details: Adds a bid with the status set to 'Placed'.

params.bidMsg: The details of the bid to be added.
params.bids: The mapping of bids for swap orders.

params.id: The unique identifier for the new swap order.
params.makeswap: The details of the swap to be added.
params.sender: The address of the user who is creating the swap order.

generateNewAtomicSwapID(bytes32,address).details: Uses keccak256 hashing to generate a unique ID.

params.contractAddress: The address of the contract using the ID.
params.uuid: A unique value used to generate the ID.
